dns.base_uri: https://localhost/dns/api (if using Dyn, remove this field, or make its value empty)
dns.user: cloudos-dns-admin (if using Dyn, put dyn username here)
dns.password: user password goes here. (if using cloudos-dns, use this value: ../cloudos-dns/init.json, admin.password field)
dns.account: if using Dyn, put main dyn account here. omit if using cloudos-dns
dns.zone: if using Dyn, put zone name here. omit if using cloudos-dns
